name: WycheProof and the Musical Runes
description:
A young dragon has to protect his baby sister - an egg - while his mother is off getting breakfast!  

My name is Wycheproof, and I need to protect my baby sister!
Use the W, A, S, and D keys to move me around!
Left click to fire mana at the bad guys!
Right click to pick up Runes, then drop them on the Runestones to get some help!
